Description: Date of the event (MM/DD/YY)
Name of the county where the event occurred
Diameter of hail in inches
Named location where the event began
Local (or unknown) time the event began
Number of direct injuries caused by the event
Estimated property damage (in dollars)
Estimated crop damage (in dollars)
Timezone abbreviation for the event area
Type of measured storm magnitude (e.g., EG, MG, blank)
FIPS code for the county or zone
NWS Weather Forecast Office ID
Source of the event report
Cause of any flood event (if applicable)
Tornado path length in miles (if applicable)
Tornado maximum width in yards (if applicable)
Distance from a reference point at event start
Compass direction of start location (N, E, SSW, etc.)
Distance from a reference point at event end
Compass direction of end location (N, E, SSW, etc.)
Named location where event ended
Local (or unknown) time the event ended
Latitude of event’s start location
Longitude of event’s start location
